com.yantra.api.omp.order

Interface getOrdersForReturn

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.OMPApi, YIFApi

    public interface getOrdersForReturn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getOrdersForReturn(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The getOrdersForReturn API fetches a set of sales orders that are associable to the return order.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrdersForReturn

        org.w3c.dom.Document getOrdersForReturn(YFSEnvironment env,
                                        org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                 throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                        java.rmi.RemoteException

        The getOrdersForReturn API fetches a set of sales orders that are associable to the return order. It also provides already associated sales orders if any in the output.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits: This API invokes the following user exit:

          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetOrdersForReturnUE

        Events Raised: None

        Template Support:

        Yes. Some of the elements and attributes are not template driven.

        Refer to output xml for element level details.

        Audits: None

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None

        Database Extensibility Support: No

        Additional Information

        This API will use OrderSearchConditions present on the return order for searching for associable orders. If OrderSearchConditions are not present for the return order, other searchable information will be collected from the return order to search for sales orders. Only document types that have a transaction of INCLUDE_IN_DERIVED_ORDER that can derive the return order's DocumentType will be considered. Available quantity will be based on the pickable quantity of this transaction.

        A document template CopyCustomerInfoFromReturnOrder has been added to copy over searchable attributes from the return order to look for associable sales orders. This document template can be altered to include other searchable attributes while searching for sales orders.

        CustomAttributes can be used to determine which sales orders to consider. Both the EnterpriseCode and DocumentType are required to search against a custom attribute.

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by createEnvironment.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document of the Order. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.
        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException
